title: League of legends huge ms problem
body:
so my game used to work fine but it would sometimes crash. nowadays my game never crashes but im always over 500ms.

i disable my firewall and i make sure nothing is running while im playing. i have no antivirus program or virus. my wifi works well exept for when im on league.

plz help me fix that problem as fast as possible.

replies.body: A constantly high ping could be caused by a network problem or even how your ISP is reaching the game servers.  My recommendation would be to start off with every step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out any possibilities locally.  Hopefully, that will do the trick!
